amendment.description: After section 501 (page 21, after line 14), insert the following new section: SEC. 502. SENSE OF CONGRESS ON THE NEED FOR THE INTELLIGENCE COMMUNITY TO PROTECT CIVIL LIBERTIES OF RELIGIOUS AND ETHNIC MINORITIES. It is the sense of Congress that the intelligence community should take all appropriate actions necessary to protect the civil liberties of religious and ethnic minorities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-504 to establish the Sense of Congress that the intelligence community should take all appropriate actions necessary to protect the civil liberties of religious and ethnic minorities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
